attributes.action: Nobody who lives in the UK to have to isolate in hotels returning from holiday
attributes.additional_details: No people who live in the UK to have to isolate in hotels at their expense, when they return from holiday, it is far safer for them to be in their own homes rather that locked up with strangers around them. It is complete madness, we need MPS who will do what they are supposed to do, work for the people, not try to impose crazy rules
attributes.background: No people who live in the UK to have to isolate in hotels at their expense, when they return from holiday, it is far safer for them to be in their own homes rather that locked up with strangers around them.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571447
